remarks: Addition to both sides of 'less than or equal to'.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
leadd12dd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
leadd12dd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
leadd12dd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
leadd12dd.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
leadd12dd.ac $e |- ( ph -> A <_ C ) $.
leadd12dd.bd $e |- ( ph -> B <_ D ) $.
leadd12dd $p |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) <_ ( C + D ) ) $.
